role.argrole: thing arg0 tests to find out
thing with which arg1 is found out

example.parse: (IP (IP-SBJ (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 有的)) (VP (VV 磨光))) (PU ，) (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 有的)) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 磨))))) (PU ，) (VP (MSP 以) (VP (VV 试出) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 最)) (VP (VV 接近)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 整体感))))))
example.arg: *OP* *T*-1 最 接近 的 整体感
有的 磨光 ， 有的 不 磨
